short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the section related to Podcasts thats at the the top of the Spotify web player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The following package modifies the Spotify web player to hide the recommended Podcasts section. This is, because many people do not want to listen podcasts and the suggestions can often contain material, which users do not wish to see. Continued support is not guaranteed.
